entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
